abbreviation of Basic Input-Output System: a computer's basic firmware (= a set of programs that form part of a computer) that operates every time it starts up: Computers using Intel processors with an out-of-date BIOS refused to function when turned on. I started the PC and hit the Delete key to go into the BIOS setup.
